justification: Acknowledges Team B’s WR surplus and urgent need for reliable production, but misreads their preferences. Calling Ethan Turner an “TE1 upgrade” is inaccurate (Tier 4 vs B’s Tier 3/4 options), and Sean Adams is Out and not a steady RB or workhorse. Asking for B’s consistent possession WR (Caleb Foster, Tier 2) conflicts with B’s needs for immediate, stable starters. Rationale is brief and not evidence-based.
